section1: Our specialists are ready to help You out with any kind of special repair-, welding- or replacement jobs on your machinery units on your site or at our working space in Rohuneeme k√ºla, Viimsi vald.
section2: High quality welding processes for any kinds of metals. Such as aluminum and its alloys, cast irons, all kinds on steels, stainless steels, all non-ferrous metals.We deal with machinery units repairing and restoration. Construction-, building- and demolition machinery, agricultural machinery, water- and underwater equipment and machinery, military equipment and machinery. section3: We deal as well with all kind of the regular repair and service procedures on Your site or at our place.
section4: Broken bolt brakets of the units frames, cracks and other so-called unrepairable damage types - those jobs are our profession!
